info.name: DigEggs  (162 chars)
info.description:
The simplest 3d game.
Use mouse to avoid collisions.
it's just a demo )

renderpass.code:
#define mainImage(O,U)                             \
    vec4  c = vec4(U/7e2, 1,0), r;                 \
          r +=.01*iMouse + cos(iTime);             \
    for  (r.z = iTime; O.a++ < 1e2; )              \
          r += .5*c*(length(fract(r.xyz)-.5)-.2);  \
          O = fract(r*9.) - .1*(r.z - iTime)
renderpass.name: Image
